thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Unfriended
Facebook is confronting an intensifying crisis as U.S. and European political leaders called for aggressive inquiries into whether it failed to stop improper access and handling of user data. The backlash has renewed the prospect of tighter regulation of Facebook and other big internet companies that are already under scrutiny for how Russia manipulated their platforms before and after the 2016 presidential election and for a host of other alleged wrongs. The latest uproar centers on whether Cambridge...
